title: git submodule doesn't play nice with relative paths while cloning from http://.../.git
body:
besides creating an incorrect url from the base url and relative url within .gitmodules,
it removes the submodule if `submodule update` fails:

```
$> git clone http://datasets.datalad.org/.git datalad
Cloning into 'datalad'...                            
Checking connectivity... done.
(venv-tests)3 11061.....................................:Tue 19 Apr 2016 10:23:23 AM EDT:.
smaug:/tmp
$> cd datalad
openfmri/
(venv-tests)3 11062.....................................:Tue 19 Apr 2016 10:23:25 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/tmp/datalad[master]
$> git --version
git version 2.7.0
(venv-tests)3 11063.....................................:Tue 19 Apr 2016 10:23:30 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/tmp/datalad[master]
$> git submodule init openfmri
Submodule 'openfmri' (http://datasets.datalad.org/.git/openfmri) registered for path 'openfmri'
(venv-tests)3 11064.....................................:Tue 19 Apr 2016 10:23:37 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/tmp/datalad[master]git
$> cat .git/config 
[core]
    repositoryformatversion = 0
    filemode = true
    bare = false
    logallrefupdates = true
[remote "origin"]
    url = http://datasets.datalad.org/.git
    fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
[branch "master"]
    remote = origin
    merge = refs/heads/master
[submodule "openfmri"]
    url = http://datasets.datalad.org/.git/openfmri
(venv-tests)3 11065.....................................:Tue 19 Apr 2016 10:23:42 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/tmp/datalad[master]git
$> git submodule update openfmri  
Cloning into 'openfmri'...
fatal: repository 'http://datasets.datalad.org/.git/openfmri/' not found
fatal: clone of 'http://datasets.datalad.org/.git/openfmri' into submodule path 'openfmri' failed
(venv-tests)3 11066 ->128.....................................:Tue 19 Apr 2016 10:23:45 AM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/tmp/datalad[master]git
$> ls -lta 
total 16
drwx------  3 yoh  yoh  4096 Apr 19 10:23 ./
drwx------  9 yoh  yoh  4096 Apr 19 10:23 .git/
-rw-------  1 yoh  yoh    58 Apr 19 10:23 .gitmodules
drwxrwxrwt 18 root root 4096 Apr 19 10:23 ../
changes on filesystem:                                                                                                                                    
 openfmri | 1 -
```
